data.text: @bkrawiec1 (In case it’s not clear: people whose pedagogy I respect have different attitudes and policies about staplers. I’m not subtweeting a “side”)
@bkrawiec1 Hopefully I’m over-Phoebe-ing. Just saw some new high profile stuff in my feed and was like... https://t.co/HMduWJxVzg
@ctschroeder It's escalating? So glad I am limiting my social media. Also I bought my college-bound child a mini stapler that can attached to a key ring (or similar on his back pack). #winning
